name: Bon appetit (dequre)
description:
Eat! Eat! Eat! Eat as many tangerines as possible in 20 seconds. Don't forget that a girl can eat no more than two tangerines at a time! Do not force her to overeat, otherwise she will chew longer

In Russia, tangerines symbolize the New Year and on New Year's Eve, every person eats tangerines to the brim so that he does not want to see them for the rest of the year

Created by:

dequre - programming, concept, animation

ivka - design, concept, animation
